body.description: Enjoy the fine art of letter-writing and add flair to your correspondence -- take pen in hand and compose a letter to a friend or family member, using these beautiful stationery sheets!Board box with clear acetate lid contains 30 sheets and 24 matching envelopes.Dustings of fanciful pastel hearts and a painterly streak of pink accent each crisp stationery sheet.Subtle silver foil highlights add polish.The design is replicated on the flaps of the matching envelopes.Sheet size: 5-3/4'' wide x 7-3/4'' high.Matches Peter Pauper Press's other Tree of Hearts gifts and stationery. Read more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tree of Hearts Letter-Perfect Boxed Stationery Set Enjoy the fine art of letter writing with elegant stationery sheets and matching envelopes

Boxed set contains 30 letter sheets and 24 envelopes Gorgeous design Take pen in hand and compose a thoughtful letter using these lovely stationery sheets!Dustings of fanciful pastel hearts and a painterly streak of pink accent each crisp stationery sheet.Design is embellished with touches of silver foil. Superior stationery sheets Write with confidence. Substantial smooth-finish writing sheets support a variety of pens beautifully.Fountain pens glide over the page. 24 matching envelopes The design is replicated on the flaps of the matching white envelopes.Stationery envelopes are constructed of quality paper.

Add flair to your personal correspondence! Versatile design is suitable for a variety of occasions Keep a box on hand for whenever a handwritten letter is warranted.Sheet size—5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high—allows you to write expansively. Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp, smooth-finish sheets and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper.Stationery set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Brighten their day Nothing is more personal than a handwritten letter. Stay in touch! About our Tree of Hearts Boxed Stationery Set: Set comes with 30 designer letter sheets. Includes 24 matching stationery envelopes. Each sheet measures 5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high. Stationery set comes in a sturdy box with a clear acetate lid. Matches Peter Pauper Press's other Tree of Hearts gifts and stationery.

Tree of Hearts Journal (Diary, Notebook) Tree of Hearts Note Cards (Stationery, Boxed Cards) Tree of Hearts Large Address Book Tree of Hearts Internet Address & Password Logbook (removable cover band) Tree of Hearts Roller Ball Pen with Gift Box (Rollerball Pen) Tree of Hearts Desk Notes (Note Pad)

Our Company History In 1928, at the age of twenty-two, Peter Beilenson began printing books on a small press in the basement of his parents’ home in Larchmont, New York. Peter—and later, his wife, Edna—sought to create fine books that sold at ''prices even a pauper could afford.'' Today, still family owned and operated, Peter Pauper Press continues to honor our founders’ legacy—and our customers’ expectations—of beauty, quality, and value. Image: Peter Pauper Press headquarters, circa 1948.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stationery set!.
reviews.reviewText: I've been buying stationery sets from Peter Pauper Press for many months now and love the various designs, having bought several of them. I rotate amongst my 4 favorites, this being one of them. The paper is a good size and the sets come with coordinating envelopes. My only negative comment is that there is not enough paper for my type of letter writing. Each set comes with 30 sheets of paper and 24 envelopes. I typically use between 3-5 sheets for each daily letter so I am accumulating quite a surplus of envelopes. Wish it were possible to buy the paper alone on occasion to allow me to use up some of them. The boxes that the sets come in are great, too. I keep them when the paper is gone and have made a holder (similar to a small dresser) where the boxes serve as "drawers" to keep pens, stamps, etc. organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s difficult finding pretty writing paper now. This is a very high quality and whimsical (without being ‘cutesy’) product. The price is exactly the same as at Barnes and Noble without having to leave your home! I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A writer's gem
reviews.reviewText: Love, love, love this stationary. If you're a writer, this is the kind of stationary you want. Quality paper, beautiful designs, perfect writing surface. Makes the receiver feel special getting a letter on such elegant stationary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small Sheets of Paper
reviews.reviewText: The sheets of paper are much smaller than I thought. Would have to write really small in order not to use up all of the paper. Otherwise very pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Very pretty, I really like it. And unlike so many others today, there is glue on the envelopes. No stickers needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Stationary is hard to come by, this is a nice paper that can be used with a nice look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2021
